fullplot: An army veteran's unlikely romance with an Iraqi immigrant is put to the test when she is faced with the prospect of deportation.
plot: An army veteran's unlikely romance with an Iraqi immigrant is put to the test when she is faced with the prospect of deportation.
title: Amira & Sam

tomatoes.consensus: Amira & Sam doesn't quite live up to its premise -- or the chemistry of its stars -- but its flaws are overcome by its sweet, subversive charm.
